story.name: Omgeo_Navigation.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Navigating to Omgeo About page Given the user is on the Omgeo home page When the user clicks on the About tab Then the user shall be routed to the About content page
Scenario:Navigating to Omgeo ALERT page Given the user is on the Omgeo home page When the user selects ALERT from the dropdown under Find a Product section Then the user shall be routed to Omgeo Alert Page
Scenario:Navigating to LeaderShip Team page Given the user is on the Omgeo home page When the user clicks on the Leadership Team link Then the user shall be routed to Omgeo Leadership Team page
